title: Leveraging Deep Learning and Digital Twins to Improve Energy Performance of Buildings. (arXiv:2305.04498v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Digital transformation in buildings accumulates massive operational data, which calls for smart solutions to utilize these data to improve energy performance. This study has proposed a solution, namely Deep Energy Twin, for integrating deep learning and digital twins to better understand building energy use and identify the potential for improving energy efficiency. Ontology was adopted to create parametric digital twins to provide consistency of data format across different systems in a building. Based on created digital twins and collected data, deep learning methods were used for performing data analytics to identify patterns and provide insights for energy optimization. As a demonstration, a case study was conducted in a public historic building in Norrk\"oping, Sweden, to compare the performance of state-of-the-art deep learning architectures in building energy forecasting.

translated_title: 利用深度学习和数字孪生技术提高建筑物能源性能
translated_abstract: 建筑物数字化转型积累了大量运营数据，需要智能化解决方案来利用这些数据来提高能源性能。本研究提出了一种解决方案，即“Deep Energy Twin”，将深度学习和数字孪生相结合，以更好地理解建筑物能源使用情况，并识别提高能源效率的潜力。采用本体论创建参数数字孪生，以提供建筑物中不同系统之间数据格式的一致性。基于创建的数字孪生和收集的数据，使用深度学习方法进行数据分析，以识别模式并为能源优化提供洞见。作为示例，本研究在瑞典诺尔肯平的一座公共历史建筑中进行了案例研究，比较了最先进的深度学习架构在建筑物能源预测中的性能。
tldr: 本研究提出了Deep Energy Twin的解决方案，将深度学习和数字孪生相结合，以识别建筑物能源使用模式并提供优化能源效率的洞见。
en_tdlr: This study proposes a solution named Deep Energy Twin, which integrates deep learning and digital twins to understand building energy use and identify potential for improving energy efficiency. It adopts ontology to create parametric digital twins and performs data analytics using deep learning methods to identify patterns and provide insights for energy optimization. A case study is conducted to compare the performance of state-of-the-art deep learning architectures in building energy forecasting.
